messages.content: Hey there! I want a minimalist portfolio website for a freelance graphic designer. The site should have a clean, simple layout with lots of white space and a monochromatic color scheme. Use a modern sans-serif font and include sections for an about me, portfolio, services, and contact. The aesthetic should be sleek and professional, perfect for showcasing creative work.

Create a minimalist portfolio website for a freelance graphic designer. Use a monochromatic color palette with different shades of grey, and focus on a clean, simple layout with plenty of white space. The design should be modern and elegant, with sans-serif typography. Include sections for about, portfolio, testimonials, and contact.

Use a grid layout and large, high-quality images to showcase the portfolio pieces. The typography should be clean and sans-serif. The overall feel should be professional and cutting-edge.

I'm starting a new blog about minimalism. I want a very clean and simple design, with lots of white space. Use a monochrome color palette - mostly white and light grays. The layout should be straightforward and easy to navigate, with a focus on typography. The text should be in a modern, sans-serif font. I love the look of old-fashioned coffee shop menus, so let’s capture that aesthetic.
